downloadTitle: Improving Fault Tolerance in BizTalk Server by Using a Windows Server 2008 Failover Cluster or Windows Server 2003 Server Cluster
downloadDescription: Describes how to implement high availability for BizTalk Server components and dependencies using Windows Server Clustering technology
detailsSection: Describes how to use a Windows Server 2008 failover cluster or Windows Server 2003 server cluster to provide high availability for key BizTalk Server components and dependencies.
systemRequirementsSection: Required software for viewing the downloads: Microsoft Word or Word Viewer for the docx version.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
